<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then decreasing size, and then the original order as recorded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in Scratch.  The decreasing-size aspect of this is only really</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// important if we get into the gap-filling stage below, but it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// doesn&#39;t hurt here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#add1eb5637dd671428b6f138ed3db6428">array&#95;pod&#95;sort</a>(FirstFlexible, E,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;lhs, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;rhs) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Decreasing alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a31b084098ebbf47988d1817a597b52d2">Alignment</a> != rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a31b084098ebbf47988d1817a597b52d2">Alignment</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a31b084098ebbf47988d1817a597b52d2">Alignment</a> &lt; rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a31b084098ebbf47988d1817a597b52d2">Alignment</a> ? 1 : -1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Decreasing size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#ae472b245af5bd4a76bea7581ea772185">Size</a> != rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#ae472b245af5bd4a76bea7581ea772185">Size</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#ae472b245af5bd4a76bea7581ea772185">Size</a> &lt; rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#ae472b245af5bd4a76bea7581ea772185">Size</a> ? 1 : -1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Original order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> lhsNumber = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uintptr&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(lhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a432caecc9417394c69f599b6476febdb">Scratch</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> rhsNumber = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uintptr&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(rhs-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a432caecc9417394c69f599b6476febdb">Scratch</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhsNumber != rhsNumber)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (lhsNumber &lt; rhsNumber ? -1 : 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do a quick check for whether that sort alone has given us a perfect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// layout with no interior padding.  This is very common: if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fixed-layout fields have no interior padding, and they end at a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sufficiently-aligned offset for all the flexible-layout fields,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the flexible-layout fields all have sizes that are multiples</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of their alignment, then this will reliably trigger.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasPadding = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t LastEnd = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk the fixed-offset fields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Fields.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#aae2bf8b46988a2fc0589e95903930c19">begin</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != FirstFlexible; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;hasFixedOffset());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastEnd != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Offset) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">        HasPadding = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastEnd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getEndOffset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk the flexible-offset fields, optimistically assigning fixed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// offsets.  Note that we maintain a strict division between the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fixed-offset and flexible-offset fields, so if we end up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// discovering padding later in this loop, we can just abandon this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// work and we&#39;ll ignore the offsets we already assigned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HasPadding) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = FirstFlexible; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastEnd, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastEnd != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">          HasPadding = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Offset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LastEnd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getEndOffset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we already have a perfect layout, we&#39;re done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HasPadding) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a75125d8eb26768d94eb9d913015246aa">checkValidLayout</a>(Fields, LastEnd, MaxAlign);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(LastEnd, MaxAlign);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The algorithm sketch at this point is as follows.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consider the padding gaps between fixed-offset fields in ascending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order.  Let LastEnd be the offset of the first byte following the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// field before the gap, or 0 if the gap is at the beginning of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// structure.  Find the &quot;best&quot; flexible-offset field according to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// criteria below.  If no such field exists, proceed to the next gap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, add the field at the first properly-aligned offset for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that field that is &gt;= LastEnd, then update LastEnd and repeat in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order to fill any remaining gap following that field.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Next, let LastEnd to be the offset of the first byte following the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// last fixed-offset field, or 0 if there are no fixed-offset fields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// While there are flexible-offset fields remaining, find the &quot;best&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// flexible-offset field according to the criteria below, add it at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the first properly-aligned offset for that field that is &gt;= LastEnd,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and update LastEnd to the first byte following the field.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The &quot;best&quot; field is chosen by the following criteria, considered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// strictly in order:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - When filling a gap betweeen fields, the field must fit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - A field is preferred if it requires less padding following LastEnd.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - A field is preferred if it is more aligned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - A field is preferred if it is larger.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - A field is preferred if it appeared earlier in the initial order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Minimizing leading padding is a greedy attempt to avoid padding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entirely.  Preferring more-aligned fields is an attempt to eliminate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stricter constraints earlier, with the idea that weaker alignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constraints may be resolvable with less padding elsewhere.  These</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These two rules are sufficient to ensure that we get the optimal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// layout in the &quot;C-style&quot; case.  Preferring larger fields tends to take</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// better advantage of large gaps and may be more likely to have a size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that&#39;s a multiple of a useful alignment.  Preferring the initial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order may help somewhat with locality but is mostly just a way of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ensuring deterministic output.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that this algorithm does not guarantee a minimal layout.  Picking</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a larger object greedily may leave a gap that cannot be filled as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// efficiently.  Unfortunately, solving this perfectly is an NP-complete</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// problem (by reduction from bin-packing: let B&#95;i be the bin sizes and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// O&#95;j be the object sizes; add fixed-offset fields such that the gaps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between them have size B&#95;i, and add flexible-offset fields with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alignment 1 and size O&#95;j; if the layout size is equal to the end of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the last fixed-layout field, the objects fit in the bins; note that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this doesn&#39;t even require the complexity of alignment).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The implementation below is essentially just an optimized version of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scanning the list of remaining fields looking for the best, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would be O(n^2).  In the worst case, it doesn&#39;t improve on that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, in practice it&#39;ll just scan the array of alignment bins</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and consider the first few elements from one or two bins.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of bins is bounded by a small constant: alignments are powers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of two that are vanishingly unlikely to be over 64 and fairly unlikely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be over 8  And multiple elements only need to be considered when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// filling a gap between fixed-offset fields, which doesn&#39;t happen very</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// often.  We could use a data structure within bins that optimizes for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// finding the best-sized match, but it would require allocating memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and copying data, so it&#39;s unlikely to be worthwhile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start by organizing the flexible-offset fields into bins according to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// their alignment.  We expect a small enough number of bins that we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// don&#39;t care about the asymptotic costs of walking this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">AlignmentQueue &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The minimum size of anything currently in this queue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t MinSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The head of the queue.  A singly-linked list.  The order here should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// be consistent with the earlier sort, i.e. the elements should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// monotonically descending in size and otherwise in the original order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// We remove the queue from the array as soon as this is empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield">OptimizedStructLayoutField</a> &#42;Head;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The alignment requirement of the queue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;getNext(<a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;Cur) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Cur-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/optimizedstructlayoutfield/#a432caecc9417394c69f599b6476febdb">Scratch</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;AlignmentQueue, 8&gt;</a> FlexibleFieldsByAlignment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = FirstFlexible; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Head = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Alignment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t MinSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastInQueue = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Alignment == Alignment; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastInQueue-&gt;Scratch = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastInQueue = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MinSize = std::min(MinSize, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LastInQueue-&gt;Scratch = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FlexibleFieldsByAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&#123;MinSize, Head, Alignment&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify that we set the queues up correctly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> checkQueues = &#91;&amp;&#93;&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstQueue = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> LastQueueAlignment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Queue : FlexibleFieldsByAlignment) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((FirstQueue || Queue.Alignment &lt; LastQueueAlignment) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;bins not in order of descending alignment&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastQueueAlignment = Queue.Alignment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FirstQueue = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Queue.Head &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;queue was empty&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t LastSize = ~(uint64&#95;t)0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Queue.Head; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Queue.getNext(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Alignment == Queue.Alignment &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;bad field in queue&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Size &lt;= LastSize &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;queue not in descending size order&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LastSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  checkQueues();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Helper function to remove a field from a queue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> spliceFromQueue = &#91;&amp;&#93;(AlignmentQueue &#42;Queue, <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;Cur) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> ? Queue-&gt;getNext(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>) == Cur : Queue-&gt;Head == Cur);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re removing Cur from a non-initial position, splice it out</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the linked list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;Scratch = Cur-&gt;Scratch;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Cur was the last field in the list, we need to update MinSize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can just use the last field&#39;s size because the list is in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// descending order of size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Cur-&gt;Scratch)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Queue-&gt;MinSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, replace the head.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewHead = Queue-&gt;getNext(Cur))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Queue-&gt;Head = NewHead;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we just emptied the queue, destroy its bin.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FlexibleFieldsByAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a563ffc2ff61c499b3be2e00100cb72fa">erase</a>(Queue);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do layout into a local array.  Doing this in-place on Fields is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not really feasible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Field, 16&gt;</a> Layout;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a499ea32ca1b8d16cedfe01d1e5b08f29">reserve</a>(Fields.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The offset that we&#39;re currently looking to insert at (or after).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t LastEnd = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper function to splice Cur out of the given queue and add it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the layout at the given offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> addToLayout = &#91;&amp;&#93;(AlignmentQueue &#42;Queue, <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, <a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;Cur,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastEnd, Cur-&gt;Alignment));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Splice out.  This potentially invalidates Queue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    spliceFromQueue(Queue, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, Cur);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add Cur to the layout.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&#42;Cur);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>().Offset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LastEnd = Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>().getEndOffset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Always return true so that we can be tail-called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper function to try to find a field in the given queue that&#39;ll</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fit starting at StartOffset but before EndOffset (if present).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that this never fails if EndOffset is not provided.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> tryAddFillerFromQueue = &#91;&amp;&#93;(AlignmentQueue &#42;Queue, uint64&#95;t StartOffset,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   std::optional&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; EndOffset) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Queue-&gt;Head);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StartOffset == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastEnd, Queue-&gt;Alignment));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!EndOffset || StartOffset &lt; &#42;EndOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Figure out the maximum size that a field can be, and ignore this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// queue if there&#39;s nothing in it that small.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxViableSize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (EndOffset ? &#42;EndOffset - StartOffset : ~(uint64&#95;t)0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Queue-&gt;MinSize &gt; MaxViableSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the matching field.  Note that this should always find</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// something because of the MinSize check above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a5208f2b0568d811c542f8d8097dbc035">Field</a> &#42;Cur = Queue-&gt;Head, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> = Cur, Cur = Queue-&gt;getNext(Cur)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Cur &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;didn&#39;t find a match in queue despite its MinSize&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Cur-&gt;Size &lt;= MaxViableSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> addToLayout(Queue, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, Cur, StartOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;didn&#39;t find a match in queue despite its MinSize&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper function to find the &quot;best&quot; flexible-offset field according</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the criteria described above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> tryAddBestField = &#91;&amp;&#93;(std::optional&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; BeforeOffset) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!BeforeOffset || LastEnd &lt; &#42;BeforeOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> QueueB = FlexibleFieldsByAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> QueueE = FlexibleFieldsByAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start by looking for the most-aligned queue that doesn&#39;t need any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// leading padding after LastEnd.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstQueueToSearch = QueueB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; FirstQueueToSearch != QueueE; ++FirstQueueToSearch) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(FirstQueueToSearch-&gt;Alignment, LastEnd))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = LastEnd;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invariant: all of the queues in &#91;FirstQueueToSearch, QueueE)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// require the same initial padding offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Search those queues in descending order of alignment for a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// satisfactory field.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Queue = FirstQueueToSearch; Queue != QueueE; ++Queue) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (tryAddFillerFromQueue(Queue, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, BeforeOffset))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Okay, we don&#39;t need to scan those again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">      QueueE = FirstQueueToSearch;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we started from the first queue, we&#39;re done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstQueueToSearch == QueueB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, scan backwards to find the most-aligned queue that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// still has minimal leading padding after LastEnd.  If that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// minimal padding is already at or past the end point, we&#39;re done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">      --FirstQueueToSearch;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastEnd, FirstQueueToSearch-&gt;Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BeforeOffset &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt;= &#42;BeforeOffset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstQueueToSearch != QueueB &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastEnd, FirstQueueToSearch&#91;-1&#93;.Alignment))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">        --FirstQueueToSearch;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phase 1: fill the gaps between fixed-offset fields with the best</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// flexible-offset field that fits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Fields.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#aae2bf8b46988a2fc0589e95903930c19">begin</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != FirstFlexible; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LastEnd &lt;= I-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastEnd != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Offset) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!tryAddBestField(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Offset))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LastEnd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getEndOffset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phase 2: repeatedly add the best flexible-offset field until</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// they&#39;re all gone.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FlexibleFieldsByAlignment.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64disassembler-cpp/#abdb086b34295fb7aa09493c62d798465">Success</a> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;didn&#39;t find a field with no fixed limit?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copy the layout back into place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Layout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == Fields.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make a final check that the layout is valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="#a75125d8eb26768d94eb9d913015246aa">checkValidLayout</a>(Fields, LastEnd, MaxAlign);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
